title: Amazon Brings Back the New Fire TV Stick 4K at a Clearance-Level Price for Early Labor Day Deals
description: The latest Fire TV stick can make any regular TV smart and right now, it just costs $30.
content:
Smart TVs are all the rage, and while we get why, you don’t have to buy a whole new screen just to get smarter features. If your current TV still works fine, but you want to get that smart experience without shelling out big bucks, you need a Fire TV Stick.

These usually run you around $50, but right now, you can grab the latest Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K for just $30 on Amazon – a 40% discount.

This is Amazon’s newest version of its best-selling 4K stick, and it comes with better, improved features than its predecessors. 4K means you’re getting better, true-to-life visuals, especially if you’re watching on a compatible TV. HDR10+ compatibility translates into richer colors and contrasts to make the viewing experience more immersive.

Of course, audio experience matters, and for that, the latest Fire TV Stick 4K also supports Dolby Atmos. The sound won’t just reach you from the front – it travels around you and pulls you in for a cinema-like experience.

It gets you access to over 1.8 million movies and TV episodes through all the big streaming platforms – we’re talking Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, and more. Don’t want to deal with any subscription hassle? You can still stream over a million free movies and shows through apps like Tubi, Pluto TV, and Fire TV Channels.

You won’t have any issues finding the content you’re looking for, either. The new AI-powered Fire TV search feature lets you hunt by actor, genre, plot, and even movie dialogues. Say something like “Alexa, show me popular Christmas movies from the last two years”, and it will pull those right up in seconds. Don’t remember the movie name, but have a dialogue from it stuck in your mind? The smart search feature will catch it – just say the line. Alexa compatibility makes hands-free usage simple and quick.

Those owning other smart home devices like security cameras, video doorbells, and smart lights will appreciate how easy it makes controlling those as well. Plus, a stable connection is a given – thanks to Wi-Fi 6 support.

Setup is fairly straightforward. Plug it into your TV’s HDMI port, connect it to Wi-Fi, and you’re all set.

At just $30 after the discount, this Fire TV Stick is the easiest and cheapest way to get smart TV features without changing your current setup. This version is faster than ever, and can be yours for less if you’re quick.
summary: Amazon has brought back the latest Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K for $30 on Amazon, a 40% discount from its previous model. The latest version of the 4K stick comes with better features than its predecessors, including improved visuals and audio quality. It also supports Dolby Atmos and can stream over 1.8 million movies and TV episodes through streaming platforms like Netflix, Prime Video, and more. The Fire TV search feature can be accessed by actor, genre, plot, and movie dialogues. The device also supports Alexa compatibility, making hands-free usage of smart TV features easier and easier for users with current TV setup.
shortSummary: Amazon is offering the latest Fire TV Stick 4K for just $30, offering enhanced visuals, enhanced audio, and improved streaming capabilities, all without replacing a traditional TV.
argos_summary: The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K is currently available for $30, a 40% discount from its usual price. This device enhances existing TVs with 4K visuals, HDR10+ compatibility, and Dolby Atmos audio for an immersive viewing experience. It provides access to over 1.8 million movies and TV episodes across major streaming platforms, along with a smart AI-powered search feature and compatibility with Alexa for easy control of smart home devices.
